title: Blown Caddy, Drifting Ferraris - /DRIVE on NBC Sports EP10 PT1
description:
This week on /DRIVE on NBC Sports, Mike Musto drives a Cadillac built by a man who equally hates tires and small blocks. 

And, Chris Harris is given an empty track and free reign of 2 legends of Ferrari: the F40 and F50.
tags: Ferrari F40, Ferrari F50, Supercharged Cadillac
